metadata.title: dnspython: denial of service in stub resolver (moderate)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: The dnspython stub resolver is vulnerable to a denial of service (DoS) risk if an attacker sends a malicious response forged with the correct address and port before a legitimate one arrives on the UDP port used by dnspython for the query. In such cases, dnspython could either switch to another resolver or abandon the query altogether, potentially leading to service denial for that resolution.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 is installed
python-eventlet is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
